name: VeMexiGan
description:
Vemexigan is a 3D platformer - action - runner game where players control an extremely happy Vegan Mexican Superhero named Vemexigan who uses his super fart to turn people into happy vegans. He eats vegan food  which allows him to make long jumps but he gets hurt by animal products that are thrown by angry non-vegan people. 

Vemexigan! He turns you into a happy vegan!

Controller
Move: WASD
Fart: Space
Exit: Alt + F4 

- It's made in 36 hours by a team of 2 with free assets except for code and music.
